and gentlemen, today, January 14 is an
important day for the people of this struggling country.
When Queen Margret II officially
announced her abdication after 52 years of reign,
Crown Prince Frederick, the queen's eldest son, will
ascend to the
throne. According to the announcement made on the occasion of the
new year 2024, Queen Margret II
announced that she will step down.  The coronation on January 14
marks the first time a
monarch has abdicated in Denmark after nearly 900
years. The
new king's enthronement ceremony will take place
at around 9 p.m. Vietnam time today as
part of the ceremony.  meeting of the
Council of State of the circuit after the ceremony to sign the

Ba shots will be

this event. At least 10 people were killed and six
remained.  missing in a
coal mine accident in Binh Dinh Son city,
Henan province, China. The incident happened yesterday
afternoon, January 13, local time
and the cause of the accident was a gas explosion. The
accident scene was  The ladder mine was operated by the Thien
An Binh Dinh Son coal mining company.
At the time of the explosion, a
total of 425 people were
underground. The rescue force was
urgently conducting search and
rescue work.  The mine has been
detained by the government for
investigation purposes. According to AFP,
China's mining safety has
improved in recent decades,
but incidents in the industry still
occur frequently.
